channel.title: BlockParty500 on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in BlockParty500 on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
I did this, not just because Twitter should take action on Alex Jones, but also because I dislike advertisers lol #BlockParty500

Quoted shannoncoulter's tweet:
Good morning! To encourage Twitter to drop Alex Jones, I just blocked the Twitter accounts of every Fortune 500 company w/ a Twitter presence. Ready to mass block Twitter’s most lucrative advertisers with me? There are three quick & easy ways. Instructions are in this thread.
